column2: What date is the Passover according to the sacred calendar?
What day of the week is Ressurection Day?
How many feasts are in three times?
column3: Seven (Seven feasts in three times Dt 16:16)

column2: What feast is the 15th day of the first month?
What is the fulfillment of the day of Firstfruits?
The Feast of Weeks is also called what?
The Feast of Tabernacles is known as the Feast of Booths and?
Name all the seven feasts, in order.
column3: 1) Passover 2) Feast of Unleavened Bread 3) Day of Firstfruits (Day of Ressurection) 4) Feast of Weeks (Day of Pentecost) 5) Feast of Trumpets 6) Day of Atonement 7) Feast of Tabernacles
